seed_of_life_recipes.WARNING: IF NO META IS DEFINED ALL BLOCKS OF THE SAME META WILL BE TARGETED

grinding_recipes.WARNING: IF THE >INPUT< HAS NO data, ALL BLOCKS OF DIFFERENT METADATA WILL BE CONSIDERED
grinding_recipes.SO_BE_CAREFUL: IF YOU DONT WANT THAT TO HAPPEN PUT data=0 ON THE INPUT

crushing_recipes.WARNING: IF THE >INPUT< HAS NO data, ALL BLOCKS OF DIFFERENT METADATA WILL BE CONSIDERED
crushing_recipes.SO_BE_CAREFUL: IF YOU DONT WANT THAT TO HAPPEN PUT data=0 ON THE INPUT

puller_recipes.FINAL_PROBABILITY: THIS PROBABILITY / SUM OF ALL PROBABILITIES
